title: Bioway
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Organic, Western, Buffet, Fast food, Salad bar, Juice bar, Take-out, Polish
description: Offering vegetarian and vegan meals. Non-smoking with plenty of seating. Has free Wi-Fi. Located on the third floor of the Stary Browar shopping centre, at the west end. Several locations in Poland. Also serves gluten free meals.
